name: Genni, the Maid of Endymion
text:
(This card is always treated as a "Witchcrafter" card.)
If you control a Spellcaster monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 Spellcaster monster you control; banish it, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Witchcrafter" monster from your Deck, except "Genni, the Maid of Endymion". You can only use each effect of "Genni, the Maid of Endymion" once per turn.
